name: 【铳】怒气槽减少量+20%
(Manacaster) Gauge Accelerator +20%
description: 当角色的武器种类为铳时，对敌人怒气槽的削减量提升20%。
If the user wields a Manacaster, speeds the rate the OD gauge decreases by 20%.

name: 暴击率提升 I
Critical Rate I
description: 所有角色的暴击率提升2%。
Increase user's critical rate by 2%.

name: 攻击力提升 I
Strength I
description: 所有角色的基础攻击力提升3%。
Increase user's base strength by 3%.

name: HP提升 I
HP I
description: 所有角色的最大HP提升2%。
Increase user's HP by 2%.

name: 【铳】连击数持续时间 I
(Manacaster) Combo Time I
description: 当角色的武器种类为铳时，最后一次攻击命中后至连击数重置前的时间延长0.5秒。
If the user wields a Manacaster, extends the window between them hitting an enemy and the combo counter resetting by 0.5 seconds.

name: 攻击力提升 II
Strength II
description: 所有角色的基础攻击力提升6%。
Increase user's base strength by 6%.

name: HP提升 II
HP II
description: 所有角色的最大HP提升5%。
Increase user's HP by 5%.

name: 暴击率提升 II
Critical Rate II
description: 所有角色的暴击率提升5%。
Increase user's critical rate by 5%.

name: 爆发攻击伤害提升 I
Force Strike Damage I
description: 所有角色的爆发攻击造成的伤害提升7%。
Increases force strike damage by 7%.

name: 【短剑】疾风怒涛·攻+10%
(Dagger) Flurry Strength +10%
description: 当角色的武器种类为短剑时，连击达到15次以上时攻击力提升10%。
If the user wields a Dagger, increases their strength by 10% when the combo count is 15 or higher.

name: 【刀】攻击力+5%
(Blade) Strength +5%
description: 当角色的武器种类为刀时，攻击力额外提升5%。
If the user wields a Blade, increases their strength by 5%.

name: 【枪】HP+7%
(Lance) HP +7%
description: 当角色的武器种类为枪时，最大HP提升7%。
If the user wields a Lance, increases their HP by 7%.

name: 【法杖】HP+7%
(Staff) HP +7%
description: 当角色的武器种类为法杖时，最大HP提升7%。
If the user wields a Staff, increases their HP by 7%.

name: 【弓】技能自动充能速率+10%
(Bow) SP Fill Rate +10%
description: 当角色的武器种类为弓时，技能的自动充能速率提升10%。
If the user wields a Bow, increases their SP fill rate by 10%.

name: 【魔杖】技能伤害+7%
(Wand) Skill Damage +7%
description: 当角色的武器种类为魔杖时，技能造成的伤害提升7%。
If the user wields a Wand, increases their skill damage by 7%.

name: 【铳】会心威力+13%
(Manacaster) Critical Damage +13%
description: 当角色的武器种类为铳时，暴击伤害倍率提升13%。
If the user wields a Manacaster, adds 13% to the modifier applied to critical damage.

name: 【斧】会心威力+13%
(Axe) Critical Damage +13%
description: 当角色的武器种类为斧时，暴击伤害倍率提升13%。
If the user wields a Axe, adds 13% to the modifier applied to critical damage.

name: 攻击力提升 III
Strength III
description: 所有角色的基础攻击力提升10%。
Increase user's base strength by 10%.

name: 【剑】攻击力&开场龙化槽 I
(Sword) Strength&Shapeshifting Prep I
description:
当角色的武器种类为剑时，攻击力提升3%，任务开始时自身龙化槽充能5%。

(龙化系统还没有实装，目前该效果无效。)

If the user wields a Sword, increases their strength by 3% and fills 5% of the dragon gauge at the start of quests.

(Note that Shapeshifting is not implemented in this version.)

name: 【铳】连击数持续时间 II
(Manacaster) Combo Time II
description: 当角色的武器种类为铳时，最后一次攻击命中后至连击数重置前的时间延长1.5秒。
If the user wields a Manacaster, extends the window between them hitting an enemy and the combo counter resetting by 1.5 seconds.

name: 【弓】技能自动充能速率+25%
(Bow) SP Fill Rate +25%
description: 当角色的武器种类为弓时，技能的自动充能速率提升25%。
If the user wields a Bow, increases their SP fill rate by 25%.

name: 【魔杖】技能伤害+15%
(Wand) Skill Damage +15%
description: 当角色的武器种类为魔杖时，技能造成的伤害提升15%。
If the user wields a Wand, increases their skill damage by 15%.

(Dagger) Flurry Strength +20%
description: 当角色的武器种类为短剑时，连击达到15次以上时攻击力提升20%。
If the user wields a Dagger, increases their strength by 20% when the combo count is 15 or higher.

name: 【刀】攻击力+10%
(Blade) Strength +10%
description: 当角色的武器种类为刀时，攻击力额外提升10%。
If the user wields a Blade, increases their strength by 10%.

name: 【枪】HP+15%
(Lance) HP +15%
description: 当角色的武器种类为枪时，最大HP提升15%。
If the user wields a Lance, increases their HP by 15%.

name: 【法杖】回复技能效果+15%
(Staff) Recovery Potency +15%
description: 当角色的武器种类为法杖时，回复技能效果提升15%。
If the user wields a Staff, increases the potency of recovery skills by 15%.

name: 连击数持续时间 +1秒
(Manacaster) Combo Time +1
description: 所有角色最后一次攻击命中后至连击数重置前的时间延长1秒。
Extends the window between user hitting an enemy and the combo counter resetting by 1 seconds.

name: HP70% 防+10%
HP 70% = Defense +10%
description: 角色HP在70%以上时，防御力提升10%。
Increases defense by 10% when HP is 70% or above.

Critical Rate III
description: 所有角色的暴击率提升8%。
Increase user's critical rate by 8%.

Strength IV
description: 所有角色的基础攻击力提升15%。
Increase user's base strength by 15%.

Recovery Potency +10%

HP 70% = Defense +20%
description: 角色HP在70%以上时，防御力提升20%。
Increases defense by 20% when HP is 70% or above.

Critical Damage +10%
description: 所有角色的暴击伤害倍率提升10%。
Adds 10% to the modifier applied to critical damage.

Strength V
description: 所有角色的基础攻击力提升22%。
Increase user's base strength by 22%.

HP IV
description: 所有角色的最大HP提升12%。
Increase user's HP by 12%.

Skill Damage +10%

name: 重生祝福（防御力）
Draconic Resurrection(Defense)
description: 角色重生时，防御力提升10%，此效果在任务中最多发动3次。
Increases user's defense by 10% when they revive. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

name: 重生祝福（伤害提升）
Draconic Resurrection(Damage)
description: 角色重生时，造成的伤害提升10%，此效果在任务中最多发动3次。
Increases user's strength by 10% when they revive. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

Strength VI
description: 所有角色的基础攻击力提升30%。
Increase user's base strength by 30%.
